BodyName: Committee on Cultural Affairs, Libraries and International Intergroup Relations

Items.Title: Resolution recognizing and supporting the efforts of organizations that work to increase consumer awareness of and commitment to poor farming communities around the world through Fair Trade and strongly encouraging the purchase of Fair-Trade Certified coffee, especially by City agencies that use taxpayers’ money to purchase coffee
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognizing and supporting the efforts of organizations that work to increase consumer awareness of and commitment to poor farming communities around the world through Fair Trade.
